notes_display: William Will.  Will in red ink.  Visible flecks of mica. Plate B.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Four Pence. THIS Bill shall pass
issue_obverse_legend_s: current for Four Pence, according to an Act of General Assembly of the Common-wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the tenth day of April, A. D. 1777. A groat
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is Death! | Four Pence. PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777. Four Pence.
